import React from 'react' import { Widgets, MonetizationOn, RemoveShoppingCart } from '@mui/icons-material' const ServiceCard2 = ({ passedService, passedIndex, onDeleteItem, showDelete }) => { const displayIndex = passedIndex + 1 return (

{displayIndex}

{passedService.serviceTitle}

{passedService.serviceDescription}

{passedService.serviceCategory}

Price: Rs. {passedService.servicePrice}

{showDelete && ( )}
) } export default ServiceCard2
